text: Arthur Galan AG is an Australian fashion brand. The company is based in Melbourne. It sells clothing for men and women. The company is more popular for its men's clothing. It is regularly featured in the Australian men's fashion magazine GQ Australia. Arthur Galan AG is popular because of its paisley shirts. They began making clothes for men in 1998. The womenswear clothes began selling in March 2006. == References == Category:Clothing companies of Australia Category:Organisations based in Melbourne Category:1998 establishments in Australia
title: Arthur Galan AG
